articles.author: Ben Kew, Ben Kew
articles.title: Striking Hong Kong Health Workers Demand Shutdown of Border with China
articles.description: Striking hospital workers in Hong Kong demanded a complete shutdown of the city's border with China on Friday in response to the coronavirus, entering the offices of the Hospital Authority to demand an immediate meeting with health authorities.
articles.content:
Striking hospital workers in Hong Kong demanded a complete shutdown of the city’s border with China on Friday in response to the coronavirus, entering the offices of the Hospital Authority to demand an immediate meeting with health authorities.

articles.author: John Hayward, John Hayward
articles.title: Report: Wuhan Coronavirus Patients Left to Die Without Medical Care
articles.description: A report at the Epoch Times on Thursday found appalling conditions at the hotels in Wuhan, China, where coronavirus patients have been quarantined. Whistleblowing family members of the quarantined patients said they have been left to die without medical care.
articles.content: A report at the Epoch Times on Thursday found appalling conditions at the hotels in Wuhan, China, where coronavirus patients have been quarantined. Whistleblowing family members of the quarantined patients said they have been left to die without medical care.… [+2381 chars]

articles.author: Frances Martel
articles.title: Report: Wuhan Province Cremating Hundreds per Day While China Reports Dozens of Virus Deaths
articles.description: A shocking report published Saturday local time by the Epoch Times revealed that crematoria in China are struggling to keep up with the hundreds of bodies they are receiving, suggesting Beijing is undercounting the number of coronavirus deaths in the country.
articles.content: A shocking report published Saturday local time by the Epoch Times revealed that crematoriums in China are struggling to keep up with the hundreds of bodies they are receiving, suggesting Beijing is undercounting the number of coronavirus deaths in the countr… [+5066 chars]
